Danity Kane was an American girl group comprising members Aubrey O'Day, 
Wanita "D. Woods" Woodgett, Shannon Bex, Dawn Richard and Aundrea 
Fimbres. Formed on the third iteration of MTV's Making the Band reality television 
series in 2005, they were soon signed to Bad Boy Records by Diddy. ... The three 
contestants became the first to appear in season 2 of the show.

failure of Bad Boy's Da Band, P. Diddy returned with Making the Band 3 in 2004.
